summary: Need an energy boost, here you go.
descriptionHtml:
This is an energy drink based off one in real life that I enjoy.
It restores 50 Stamina and Stamina regenerates 50% faster for the next 4 hours or 14,400 seconds as it will show.
You can find it on many food merchants and you are able to make it at a Cooking Spit for 12 Snowberries and 3 Moon Sugar, this will make 6 of them.

This isn't a sponsored mod but I do want to thank Petey's Bing for a fine product.
www.getbinged.com
author: Megahut
